sentences.english: Would we meet any in this colossal ocean?
sentences.chinese: 我們會在浩瀚的大海上遇見什麼人嗎？

sentences.english: The world puts off his masks of vastness to his lover.
sentences.chinese: 世界對着他的愛人，把它浩瀚的面具掲下了。

sentences.english: I would speed the vast career of civilizing lore .
sentences.chinese: 我要儘快地充實浩瀚的知識寶庫。

sentences.english: The world pets off its mark of vastness to its lover.
sentences.chinese: 世界對它的愛人，把它浩瀚的面具揭下了。

sentences.english: There was the vast sea with many little green islands on it.
sentences.chinese: 浩瀚的大海中點綴着許多綠色的小島。

sentences.english: In an instant, I would put a huge flow of learning English.
sentences.chinese: 瞬間，我便投入到了浩瀚的英語學海之中。

sentences.english: Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity.
sentences.chinese: 世界上唯有兩件東西浩瀚無邈，一是宇宙，一是傻逼。

sentences.english: The expeditioners looked for water in the vast desert.
sentences.chinese: 考察隊員在浩瀚的沙漠中尋找水源。

sentences.english: I have crossed oceans of time to find you.
sentences.chinese: 我跨越浩瀚的時間海來尋你。

sentences.english: The one builds the stage, is a sea of books dated back to the remote antiquity.
sentences.chinese: 築起舞臺的，是一座延綿在今與昔的浩瀚書海。

sentences.english: Guests can also ride camel, appreciate at the vast desert landscape.
sentences.chinese: 客人也可自費騎駝，欣賞浩瀚無垠的大漠風光。

sentences.english: That great, infinitesimal question - I can't shake it out of my thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 那偉大的浩瀚無涯的問題我是無法趕出腦袋了。

sentences.english: Due for completion in the middle of the century, it involves the construction of three vast channels.
sentences.chinese: 預計本世紀中葉竣工的工程包含三條浩瀚的人工運河。

sentences.english: There is origin even for vast ocean, and root for giant trees.
sentences.chinese: 浩瀚大海有源頭，參天大樹有鬚根。

sentences.english: And though death may hide me, and the greater silence enfold me.
sentences.chinese: 即使死神將我的身形藏匿，更浩瀚的靜寂將我包圍。

sentences.english: Nearby, the clear Wanquan River empties itself into the boundless Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 不遠處，清清萬泉河水流入浩瀚的太平洋。

definition: vast and mighty (of river or ocean)/broad and powerful
